attributes.additional_details:
Keith Jones must be stopped from submitting any further frivolous e-petitions!

I encourage you now to search for Keith Jones by name on this website and you will find hundreds (thats right, hundreds) of the most nonsensical, petty and often offensive petitions submitted by him. This man's continued affronts to British national culture are the greatest threat we as a country face today. Keith Jones must be STOPPED!

As a first step, the moderators of this site must ban Keith Jones from posting any more e-petitions. If this should prove innefectual then the government must take legislative measures to put a stop, once and for all, to the activities of this serial-petitioning fiend.
